page.title: 06PEDESTRIANISATION (cont)
page.content: The director of Roads & Transport for Dumfries & Galloway said that the proposed pedestrianisation of the town centre should be financed by 1986.The work should start in 1987 and be finished by 1988.The work will cost roughly Â£430,000 half the money will be paid in the financial year of 1986 and the other half in the next year. The benefit of having the town centre pedestrianised is that the shoppers can mill about when shopping and visit more shops hence giving the shopkeepers more business. All the shop owners we spoke to said that the pedestrianisation of the town centre would mean an increase in their number of customers.We surveyed 100 people,here are the results: WOULD PREFER PEDEST. 79% DIDN'T WANT PEDEST. 18% DIDN'T MIND 3%
